body.name: Sakugi Shower Caddy - X-Large Adhesive Shower Organizer, Rustproof Shower Shelves for inside Shower, Stainless Steel Shower Rack for Bathroom, Home Decor, No Drill, Silver, 2 Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 59 mins
features: LARGE CAPACITY: Sakugi black bathroom decor can neatly organize all your bath accessories for over 20 pieces. At over 13 inches long, it offers ample storage space to hold everything from shampoo and conditioner to loofahs and face wash. Sakugi wall-mounted shower holder organizes your bathroom essentials yet takes up just a little space.

CORROSION-RESISTANT MATERIAL: The 2-pack Sakugi adhesive apartment essentials are built to last while combining practicality and style! The bathroom shower organizers feature premium heavy-duty stainless steel and a sleek black coating, which are waterproof, rust-proof, and anti-scratch. Moreover, you can wipe its smooth surface down in seconds, or just rinse and go!

SIMPLE INSTALLATION: Setting up your Sakugi bathroom caddy for shower is super easy in 3 steps, and then you'll have an ultra-durable caddy that is custom-fit to your space. All you need to do is wipe off the desired location, attach the adhesive tape to the wall, and hang up the rack. (Note: Install the rack on smooth, non-porous surfaces for better results.)

STRONG ADHESIVE: Sakugi drill-free bathroom shelf organizer is equipped with 2 ultra-powerful adhesive tapes, each capable of holding up to 12 lb that is more reliable than the shower caddy with suction cups! Just stick them to any smooth shower surface, and they will stay put without drilling or tools required. Besides, you can easily remove the wall-friendly adhesive tape with a hair dryer.

EASY DRAINAGE: Sakugi bathroom organizer for shower features an easy water drainage system. The excess water can slide through the strategically spaced lattice bottom, keeping your shower supplies clean and dry. Moreover, you can flip the bottle upside down in the round hole at the bottom for convenient dispensing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, spacious, stylish and sturdy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Idiotproof and looks great
reviews.reviewText: Needed for storage in a very small shower. Works great. Super easy installation (literally 2 steps). Idiotproof. Adhesive is VERY strong. Deep enough to hold liter shampoo bottles. Looks high quality. Very happy with this purchase, would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our kids will be smart and beautiful!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great combination of strong and beautiful in the engineering and design of these pieces. The shelves are so chic and functional. They hold all of my shower products without dropping, sagging, molding, breaking, or tarnishing. Two bottles of hair products, sugar scrub, body wash, my razor and my antimicrobial body scrubber all fit on one shelf. My only issue was that once the sticky strip that holds it up is on, you can't un-stick it. So, one of my shelves is crooked. Haha, it's my fault but just as a cautionary tale, make sure you have it level before you stick it to any surface. I love these shelves, and I will order again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy. Built well. Looks good.
reviews.reviewText: Adhesion sticks very well. I have multiple heavy items in each unit and it has held up over the last few months. Has not rusted, tarnished or scratched from high volume usage. The product is well built. So far it seems like it will last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using the Sakugi Adhesive Shower Caddy for some time now, and it’s been a great addition to my bathroom. This set of two large, rustproof shelves offers a practical and stylish storage solution.Firstly, the stainless steel design in black is both modern and sleek, fitting well with different bathroom decors. The size of the shelves is generous, providing ample space for all my shower essentials, from large shampoo bottles to smaller soap bars.The adhesive installation is a breeze and a huge plus for me. No drilling means no damage to tiles or walls, and the adhesive is surprisingly strong and reliable. The caddies have stayed firmly in place, even with heavier items stored on them.The rustproof feature is another bonus. They’ve held up well in the humid environment of the shower without any signs of rust, maintaining their neat appearance.The only minor downside is that the adhesive, while strong, might not fare well on all surfaces. It’s important to ensure your wall type is compatible and the surface is clean before installation.Overall, the Sakugi Adhesive Shower Caddy scores a solid 4 out of 5 stars. It’s functional, stylish, and easy to install, making it a nearly perfect solution for bathroom organization. Just double-check your wall type for the best adhesive results!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it so much I Ordered 2nd set
reviews.reviewText: Great product! Looks so nice and is so sturdy! It holds all of my shower bottles and the hooks are great to hang my loofah.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Study and sleek
reviews.reviewText: Minimalist design. Sturdy and holds many items! Great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far this is excellent. No suction cups, it has a long sticky strip to attach to the tiles. Clean & dry tiles very well first thing. This was a great bargain and I put so much stuff on the two shelves and got everything off the bath surround. They provide some hooks as well to hang things. As you can see I'm drying my bath pillow. The most important thing is the great suction of the Taili shower grab bars I ordered through Amazon. Safety First! By the way this is an ugly bathroom that I will be redoing soon.
